name: Michaël vd Poppe Pool
desc: Michaël van de Poppe, a 32-year-old economist, crypto expert, and entrepreneur from the Netherlands, began his crypto journey in 2017 when a friend introduced him to Bitcoin and Altcoins. Fascinated by the potential of blockchain to transform the financial world, he invested in his first Altcoin. Since the beginning of 2018, Michaël started working full time in the Web3 sector when he launched his first crypto educational company. He runs MN Capital and MN Fund, an investment fund registered with the Dutch Financial Authorities, and also produces the New Era Finance Podcast.
